title: ProEvent - Leading Event & Film Production Staffing in NYC
description: ProEvent is New York's leading provider of high-end staffing for events and film productions, catering to billionaires, luxury brands, and elite private gatherings. We specialize in exclusive staffing for film productions, high-profile galas, luxury weddings, and corporate events.
